mapper.select: SELECT p.pname, p.sdt, p.edt, p.ptover, pl.pno, pl.plno, pl.pldt, pl.pltover, d.dno, d.dcont, d.dchek, d.uno FROM PLAN pl INNER JOIN PROG p on pl.pno = p.pno INNER JOIN DIARY d on pl.plno = d.plno WHERE p.pno = #{arg0} AND d.uno = #{arg1} ORDER BY pl.pltover
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DIARY (dcont, dchek, plno, pno, uno) VALUES (#{content}, #{dcheck}, #{no}, #{program.no}, #{uno})
mapper.select: SELECT pl.pno, pl.pltover, pl.pldt, pl.pltitl, d.dcont, d.dchek, d.dno, d.uno FROM PLAN pl INNER JOIN DIARY d on pl.plno = d.plno WHERE d.dno = #{value}
